protocol.name: P-GSE40520-1
protocol.text: Affy-GUI, normalized by GCRMA. ID_REF =  VALUE = log2 GCRMA

protocol.name: P-GSE40520-10
protocol.text: The samples were 3'-end-labelled with dd-UTP (Roch) by the terminal transferase (TdT, Roche) reaction for 1.5 h at 37 degrees C

protocol.name: P-GSE40520-11
protocol.text: Whole Genome Tiling Array was hybridized for 16 hrs, washed, and stained with a streptavidin-phycoerythrin conjugate on the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450 according to the standard Affymetrix protocol.

protocol.name: P-GSE40520-12
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned on Affymetrix scanner G7

protocol.name: P-GSE40520-3
protocol.text: Plants were germinated and grown on plates containing Murashige and Skoog salts, pH 5.7, 1% sucrose (w/v), and 0.5% phytogel (w/v) in continuous light at 22°C.

protocol.name: P-GSE40520-4
protocol.text: Trichomes were removed with forceps from the fifth and sixth rosette leaves of three-week-old wild-type and gtl1-1 mutant plants according to a previously established protocol (Jakoby et al, 2008). Total RNA was extracted from three biological replicates by a Qiagen plant RNeasy kit, and treated with DNaseI (Takara Bio, Japan) following the manufacturer’s instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE40520-5
protocol.text: RNA probes were labeled using an Affymetrix 3' IVT Express Kit (Affymetrix, Japan)

protocol.name: P-GSE40520-6
protocol.text: Hybridized onto Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome GeneChips® (Affymetrix Inc., USA) according to manifucture's instruction (Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-GSE40520-7
protocol.text: GeneChips are scanned in a GeneChip Scanner 3000 (Affymetrix Inc., USA) and CEL files are generated from DAT files using GeneChip® Operating Software (GCOS) software (Affymetrix Inc., USA).

protocol.name: P-GSE40520-8
protocol.text: 1/2 MS with 1% sucrose under continuous light

protocol.name: P-GSE40520-9
protocol.text: Samples were prepared by ChIP using an antibody against GFP
